name: Warpstone Bomb
description: A device of whirring gears, ragged wires and pulsing warpstone, this bomb is deadly to all.
effect: Discard this card to use this action:

actions.name: Bomb
actions.description: Pick a space in your hero's chamber. Roll a dice for any heroes or adversaries in that space or adjacent to it. On a 2 or more, they suffer 2 wounds. On a 6, they suffer 4 wounds.
